title: Issues in fullscreen, like  inability to interact with the game and annoying rendering delay
body:
As of sometime around last December  2016 there was a note on my league client that said Rengar was having problems and was disabled, and some reported issues in fullscreen.

Ever since My client has choppy everything and loading like one fame per minute, or I get a white screen that I cannot interact with.

Now I've been playing for a time exclusively in windowed (because in borderless I have the same problem.

I have tried reinstalling league and changing the resolution and to the lowest settings, but cannot get my images to changes smoothly (or at all sometimes) even on absolute lowest settings, but have no problems running the game in windowed besides every so often r-clicking stuff n my desktop when the edges bug out.

It seems no one has this issue? Can anyone help me?

Note: I started having this problem when the beta for the new client came out, and I played for two years without any problems in fullscreen. I've considered it might hardware, but It works fine in windowed.

replies.body: The fullscreen issue that you mention was an older issue, and shouldn't be the cause of these frame rates.  While reinstalling is a safe step, there could be other outliers like outdated drivers or something else.  Run through each step of the [FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide to help troubleshoot.  Also, if you have Windows 10, try disabling the [Xbox Game Bar](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html) as it's been auto-enabled for some players and causing issues like this.  Let me know if that helps.
Forgot to mention this but I am playing on a mac, and I tried reinstalling with no effect.
